items.title: Why have Asian markets plunged?
items.description: Asian markets from Tokyo to Sydney plunged amid increasing fears of a global economic downturn.

items.title: Tariffs have shaken the markets - how worried should we be?
items.description: Workers are right to fear for their pensions, but the greater worry is the here and now - the economy they live in.

items.title: US defends tariffs on remote island of penguins and seals
items.description: A group of islands, occupied only by penguins and seals, has been swept up in Trump's trade war.

items.title: 'Sometimes you have to take medicine': Trump defends sweeping tariffs
items.description: Just hours after Trump's comments, stock markets plunged in Asia early on Monday, with Hong Kong's Hang Seng losing 9.8%.

items.title: Australia PM candidate ditches plan to end work from home
items.description: Peter Dutton's Liberal-National coalition had said the move would improve efficiency in the public sector.
